short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search. Simple and Fast. UpSearches is a search-focused extension that offers default search that is simple and fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search with UpSearches. Simple and Fast.
UpSearches is a search-focused extension that provides a default search experience that is simple and fast. 

Click 'add to Chrome' to install, change your default search to Microsoft Bing and consent to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://www.upsearches.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.upsearches.com/privacy-policy
 
Enjoy getting a fast response to your query and easy-to-use search functionality.
Try UpSearches today!
-	Easily search for anything
-	Enjoy a rich search experience
-	Minimalistic, clean search interface

For easy access, we recommend pinning the extension to your browser toolbar.
